Text: Uhhhhhh... Like a thousand knives, slicing and stabbing...
B-Brace yourselves... This is the mother of all─blaaaaaarrrghhh!
Good work, Ezel! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>─get ready!
Hehehehe... A plague. You are a plague.
I'm a plague... My existence brings only torment... Better that I fade away...
Not good! We must vanquish the nightmare before it's too late!
Yesss... Let your torment consume you. Let it spread all around you.
Those things... They're manifestations of torment!
They feed into An Lad! If we don't stop them, the nightmare will grow stronger!
Let us form a protective circle!
Meddlesome wretches. Begone with you.
Oh, what now? Watch out, you two!
You are alone. No one cares for you. No one will save you.
It's going after An Lad! We must stand with them!
An Lad, stay strong! We're here for you!
Huzzah! We did it!
It's over...  You're free now, An Lad...
Nightmares remaining
Ah! Wait just a─!
An Lad... Let's keep giving chase while we tend to the nightmares!
I have a bad feeling about this...
An Lad, wait! We want to help you!
An Lad is fading fast! We don't have much time!
I'm ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Just say the word!
I still sense a nightmare nearby... Let's hurry and find it!
Designation: Blassty. Intruders to central calculation system detected. Initiating extermination protocol!
Designation: Brute Justice. Temporal interlopers identified. Verdict: Guilty. Punishment: Eradication!
Initiating new combat protocol... Commence final judgment!
Final judgment passed... Bask in the light and be cleansed!
Final judgment passed... Atone with your lifeblood!
I am Alexander...the Creator. You...who would prove yourself worthy of your utopia...will be judged.
The time of judgment is nigh...
Executing judgment protocol in 10 seconds...
5 seconds to divine judgment...
4 seconds...
I am the Creator... I will rebuild, remake, reform myself into the ultimate state of perfection...!
Designation: Brute Justice. Standing by for assembly!
Designation: Blassty. Standing by for assembly!

I am Alexander...the Assembled.
Look upon the perfection that will be your destruction...
Difference engine fully powered... Beginning future simulation...
Space-time interference restrictions lifted... Initializing temporal prison...
Behold the Ruby Weapon! It will be the last thing you ever see!
Deploying claws!
You won't even see them coming!
Commencing high-velocity assault!
Synthetic auracite safety locks removed. Preparing Ultima, maximum power!
Energy levels at critical! Unleashing Ultima!
This can't be! The Ruby Weapon is unstoppable!
Wh-What is this!? No! Get out of my mind!
Stop! No, I'm not...Nael... I am...
I am...Nael van Darnus.
Come to purify this forsaken land.
The legacy of ancient Allag is mine to command!
How can this be!? O mighty Dalamud, am I not Thy loyal servant!?
Red moon of destruction, I shall prove to Thee my worth!
No...Dalamud did fall... I know it to be true!
O Brother...Nael! Your name shall live on for eternity!
I shall...see your ambitions fulfilled!
Fall, fall! Death to the undeserving!
Vengeance shall be mine!
Purge these unthinking beasts!
All my despair, all my rage... Become my shield!
Frozen in sorrow, burning with rage!

Increasing pilot override rate to 100%.
Commencing forced shutdown and system restart.

Synthetic auracite switching to Oversoul mode.
Loading data sample.

Darnus combat data ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.

Preparing combat data.
Subject: Darnus.
Anti-eikon weaponry, restraints removed.
Ungh! Such speed...but I'm still in control!

Initiating Ultima sequence.
Ignore all warnings.

I'm sorry, everyone. This is the end for me.
Activating...Oversoul.
Arrive at Katharsis
Clear Katharsis
Arrive at Doxa
Clear Doxa
Arrive at Noesis
Defeat Rukshs Dheem
[To the depths!]
[These are poor neighbors indeed...]
[The time has come to part with these interlopers.]
[The walls fall─we must hurry.]
[We were fortunate... But what is all of this?]
[Tiresome creatures.]
[There it lies. I give you my breath...]
[Your wish is granted. Go, little wanderers.]
Your kind has never given of its treasures willingly─your lives will be no different.
You know nothing of the depths! Nothing!
[Hah!]
Visions of eld, attend to us now...
Clear the Trial of Ronka!
Free your comrades from the talismans!
Defeat the huaca!
Yet to heroes proven learned and wise, a comrade's soul shall be their prize.
If you would see theirs set free, answer me these riddles three.
'Twixt these talismans hide friend and foe. Choose your companions well, or sorrow know.
A test of mind and memory. Choose wisely, and you all may yet go free.
Desire you that which I yet claim? Then we shall play another game...
Yet still there remains one trial you must pass.
Deft of paw, with kin do I vie. Though sought apart, betterment of the whole do our efforts descry. What...am...I?
With fearsome fang, I travel with pack. Together we find harmony, and thus for peace our land does not lack. What...am...I?
On my belly do I crawl. By my strength does prosperity reign within our hall. What...am...I?

You trespass, mortal, upon sacred ground.
In retribution, four souls have I bound.
Leave Trial's Threshold
A pathetic display, one and all. The weak shall not be suffered to disgrace this sacred hall.
Indeed, the opo-opo is keen and shrewd. The spirit of ingenuity, by whose guidance the Ronkans did prosperity pursue. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
Indeed, 'twas the spirit of the wolf their doctrines praised. That they would know peace and harmony to the end of their days. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
Indeed, the dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder. The riddle's answer you did discern, and thus to you a soul returns.
Alas, 'twas the opo-opo. Keen and shrewd, its spirit exalts ingenuity, a virtue by which the Ronkans did prosperity pursue.
Alas, 'twas the wolf their doctrines praised. That they might know peace and harmony to the end of their days.
Alas, 'twas a snake. The dread serpent turned protector, lured to slumber ere it tear the world asunder.
For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
For this mistake, a single talisman I shall take.
If you would glean the knowledge enshrined in this earth, I would first take the measure of your worth.
Solve the riddles of the huaca!
Your comrades are assembled, together at last...
Finally! This is what I was expecting to find here in the ruins.
Be careful, sisters!
Hold nothing back. Failure of this test does not appear to be an option.
Quickly─fan out before it strikes!
Its sights are set on Y'shtola! Hurry, we must protect her!
Victory oft begs sacrifice, but which of you would pay the price?
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! Hurry, we have to save <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>!
Oh, no─Cymet!
Impressive...
You may think you have won, but we have only just begun!
Poison!? \\<cough> \\<cough> Come, gather around me.
Reinforcements? Leave them to me!
We mustn't waste time with this slime─focus on the guardian!
Show them your all!
Well fought, hero, the trial is complete. The way is open, and thus...I concede...defeat...
Not wholly unexpected, but an exhausting ordeal nevertheless.
One worthy of she who the Ronkans extolled, must be strong of mind, body, and soul.
Make your way to the transmission tower!
Speak with Cid!
Defeat the imperial soldiers!
Defeat the antibodies!
Defeat Bahamut!
This is Bozja Citadel, alright. At least...I think it is. Was everything so distorted when you tested this before?
Your recollection of this place appears grossly incomplete. I can but assume your memory is being warped by your subconscious.
Well I'd rather not stand around laboring over details. Let's look for the transmission tower in the Principia. Anything of import would've been stored there.
You've done it, Cid! The road has returned.
We should be able to reach the Principia if we keep heading north.
Look! There's the transmission tower!
The tension in the air is palpable.
Ah, right. The soldiers were on high alert that day.
The Bozjan Resistance had infiltrated the citadel to stop the Academy's experiments.
A curious question. One I believe worth investigating. Shall we?
The memory appears to be...mending itself? Interesting.
Could they be a manifestation of your subconscious? If so, they likely seek to suppress your memories of the citadel.
Meaning they intend to purge us from your mind. We cannot let them!
Is there no end to them? We have to hold on, lest they succeed in erasing us from Cid's mind.
Are we sure I'm not suffering from a sudden onset of psychosis?
Just a little further...
Is that...Cid? Do you recall this happening?
Father, please! If you would just look over this data─
Enough, damn you! The next time you question me it shall be the last. Now leave!
You of all people should understand the risks. Why do you refuse to see reason?
It's rather unlike him to overlook data, no matter the source.
Look here. You─er, I mean... He left behind his research documentation.
There they are! The replicas of Gunnhildr's blades!
Bahamut!? This has to be another attempt by your subconscious to stop us. Please, Cid, you have to pull yourself together.
Careful. I like not the looks of this...
Oh no! Could his psyche be deteriorating? <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, look out!
We have to hold on! For Cid!
Thank you. I... I feel better, now.
Perhaps now your subconscious will be more forthcoming with the truth in this memory.
The Meteor project cannot be stopped! I will not allow it!
Taste my steel!
Careful of his blade!
Your struggles shall avail you not!
Keep your distance!
You would dash yourself against my shield? Very well...
I will mount your heads upon my wall!
He would turn the very air against us. Have care, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
Ready the turrets!
うるさい機械を、先に壊すわよ！
I tire of these games!
You dare defy me!?
I thought to offer you a quick, painless death. Alas...
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>. A little help, if you'd be so kind.
I can take the brunt of it, but I'll need a little help!
By thy leave!
Now! Drive it back!
Hold on just a little longer!

リーン、今だ！
力を解き放てッ……！
Minfilia... Give me strength!
I shall not yield!
That my defenses could be broken...
It is time I bring my full strength to bear!
All of our research, our planning... It cannot be for naught!
The Empire cannot...must...not...
Leave this to me.
Quickly! My barrier shan't hold long!
We've come too far to fail now!
Come on, we can't give up!
Hold on, Thancred!
We're so close!
We've no choice but to fight. Otherwise, his subconscious will continue to repress this memory.
What in the world? The road, it just...ends.
A consequence of your incomplete memories. You have to think back, Cid. Where did this road lead?
Damn it all, the road is cut off again. Come on, Cid, you have to remember.
A psychological stimulus to prompt recollection... Yes, that just might work.
Well done, Cid. Let us press onward.
Search for clues to help Cid's memory.
Speak with Cid.
Did you see that? A military base appeared out of thin air... Or out of my mind, I suppose.
Do you suppose it's possible we can tamper with this memory?
Altering memories is easier said than done, it seems. Well, let's keep going.
Here we are. The Principia. Inside is the transmission tower.
What in the seven hells are these!?
Curious that we could defeat these but not the soldiers earlier. Perhaps because they are not truly part of this memory?
We can worry about that later. Come on, we're nearly to the tower.
Gah! I... I can't...move.
It seems to be having an adverse effect on Cid's psyche. Quickly, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>, we have to stop it!
Piteous worms! There will be naught left of you but ash!
I shall not yield!
That my defenses could be bested...
It is time I bring my full strength to bear!
I'll hold his attention. Cover me.
By the gods, this data... The Empire would invite a calamity.
So many sleepless nights spent on those damned papers. All for nothing...
If my suspicions are correct, then he was already... Ahem. Never mind, let us press on. The truth awaits us.
Review Cid's research!
Defeat Varis yae Galvus!
Defeat Ramuh

Thou wouldst forge this world anew?
I, Ramuh, shall test thy worth.
Spears of lightning, to me!
May levinbolts strike thee down!
From the storm of my judgment, thou shalt not escape!
Swift as thou art, I am swifter still!
The rolling of thunder foretells thy doom, mortal.
By the fourteen bolts be thee rent asunder!
Thou art resilient indeed, but thy trial is far from over.
Come, mine arbiters! Test this mortal's resolve.
'Neath rolling cloud, unrelenting lightning doth strike!
The time of thy judgment is nigh!
The end hath come. Prepare thyself!
With all my might, I smite thee!
With renewed vigor, mine arbiters enter the fray!
O noble beasts of the levin, may none withstand your charge!
I have taken thy measure, Bringer of Light.
Over and over doth lightning strike thee!
Each bolt is mine to command!
Thy bravery is commendable, though it shall avail thee naught...
Arbiters! With me!
Defeat Garuda and Ifrit
Such lowly creatures. I shall not suffer them to live!
And I shall not suffer thee to fail, Garuda!
Insolent worms! They dare defy me!?
A pitiful display. Stand aside!
These mortals are not so easily bested...
No more games. We face them together!
Impossible! From where doth this strength spring!?
Join me, Ifrit! By raging wind and engulfing flame, we are born anew!
Gwooooooh!
I...am Raktapaksa, he who soareth on wings of crimson.
May howling winds feed the flame!
Thou shalt defy me no more!
All shall succumb to my fury!
Defeat the Idol of Darkness

Killing them one by one's not going to work!
You'll have to attack that concentration of Darkness.
Is that what's controlling them?
Are those voidgates? Be careful!
I don't like the look of this!
The aether is becoming unstable!
The Darkness is growing!
Something's coming! Watch out!
The sin eaters... What are they doing!?
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! It'll destroy us all!

メテオ計劃を中断させようなどと……
大将軍たる我が許すものか！
ガンバスタードの力、試してみるか……！
少しはやるようだが……この攻撃ならばどうだ？
ガンシールド、エネルギー充填を開始する……！
震え、怯え、頭を垂れよ……！
魔導タレット、起動……！
さかしい連中だ……ならば……！
ガンバスタード、出力最大……消し飛ぶがよい！

耐え抜くとは、驚いた……。
ならば、全力で戦い抜くのみよ！
我が大盾に、防げぬものなし……！
な、なんと……我が大盾を貫いたとッ！？

ガンバスタード、リミッターカット……！
帝国の力、あなどるなよ！

グッ……メテオ計劃、停滞させてなるものか……！
おおおおおおッ！
ガレマール帝国が敗れるというのか……！？
The Light... It's too much for her to bear!
She won't last much longer!
Enough of this! Power of Darkness, answer my call!
Hyaaah!
Fools... You would stoke the fires of conflict?
Your blood shall freeze!
Shatter!
Such impudence!
Light consume you!
Darkness begone!
Why do you resist?
Smite our foes!
Divine Light, deliver serenity everlasting!
Tranquility must be restored to the land!
I shall weave a new Dragonsong!
Resplendent ice, grant me strength!
The Light shall usher in peace!
Come to me, Hraesvelgr!
My love...
At long last, we are reunited...
And we shall never be parted again!
I won't give up...
Not on my future─our future!
And I'll be damned if I let it end here!
No! We're so close!
Do something! Anything!
Defeat Shiva
Damn this Light!
Damn it all!
I want to see what tomorrow will bring!
Darkness shall never prevail!
By my hand, this world shall be purified!
The Darkness in your hearts shall be your undoing!
May all be enveloped in Light!
The age of peace and tranquility has come...
We'll soon be off to our next destination! Raise your rods and make ready to set sail!
Weigh the anchors! Shove off!
All right, home port is callin'! Pack up your rods and prepare to return to Limsa!
That's all the fishin' we'll be doin' today. Now's the time to measure your catch!
Looks like <PcName>IntegerParameter(1)</PcName> fished up Lady Luck herself! Here comes a spectral current!
We've got <PcName>IntegerParameter(1)</PcName> to thank for this spectral current! No one's going home hungry tonight!
A fish ain't all <PcName>IntegerParameter(1)</PcName> pulled out of the water! Here comes a spectral current!
We're droppin' anchors here─Galadion Bay! Take your fill of the ocean's bounty!
Time to settle in at Galadion Bay! The weather's lookin' a mite tetchy, but manage not to fall overboard and you'll have your pick of the ocean's creatures!
Here it is─the southern Strait of Merlthor! Show me which of you is a fisher among fishers!
Ain't it a sight? The southern Strait of Merlthor! Even in this hellish weather, I reckon you lot can haul a veritable feast onto the decks of this ship!
Feel the cool wind of the northern Strait of Merlthor against your faces! The only thing better is the pull of a fish at the end of your hook!
It's rough seas today in the northern Strait of Merlthor! Brave through them, however, and there's no tellin' what you'll pull outta the sea!
The Rhotano Sea welcomes us with open arms─let's hope its fish are just as welcoming!
Seems nature doesn't feel like welcoming us to the Rhotano Sea! No matter─we'll take what we need!
Welcome to the Cieldalaes! Pick a spot at the rail and have at it─I want to see my deck squirmin' with scales!
Not the best weather to be navigatin' the Cieldalaes, but the bigger the risk, the bigger the fish, I always say!
Ah, taste the spray from the Bloodbrine Sea! This water's saltier than my old granddad and teemin' with fish for the takin'!
The Bloodbrine's downright murderous today! Have a care when you haul in your catch, or the crimson in the swells might well be yours!

Ohhh, we're sailin' round in Rothlyt Sound, with rod in hand and hearts unbound!♪
Right, enough singin'─time for fishin'!

Ohhh, the seas are wroth in Rothlyt Sound─hold fast now, mates, or we'll be drowned!♪
Perfect conditions for hookin' a monster, I reckon!
Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty fish!
Here they come! A whole flock of gulls flyin' in our direction!

Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...
Keep an eye out. If the seagulls gather in a big ol' flock, it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.
We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!
Oho! Looks like a mob of dolphins is makin' right for us!

See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.
We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!
Look at all them squawkers! They must've spotted a shoal of tasty morsels!
There's a whole flock of gulls here! The water must be churnin' with big ol' fish!
Have you ever seen so many gulls!? Cast a line, and let's see what they're after!
We've got dolphins fore and aft! That's a sign of good fortune, that is!
Look! Dolphins! The Navigator smiles upon us this day!
Dolphins! A whole mess of 'em! We're in for a wave of Llymlaen's favor─you'll see!

There are gulls about...
Makes you wonder what drew 'em near, eh?
Keep an eye out. If the seagulls are flockin', it's a good idea to get your hook in the water.

Seems the ship's got some feathered friends.
I wonder if more of their mates'll be joinin' them...

See them dolphins swimmin' nearby?
Could be they're scoutin' ahead for the rest of the pod.
We could be in for some luck. Dolphins are harbingers of the spectral current─every sailor knows that!
We've spotted dolphins around the ship. Our luck's about to pick up, I reckon.
Ah, you hear that whistlin' in the breeze? That means we're in the Sirensong Sea, and its bounty is yours for the takin'!
Every siren in the sea is wailin' now! Will you go home with a barrel full o' fish, or will another soul be taken by their stormy song?
Feast your eyes on Kugane, more dazzlin' than the Ruby Sea herself! The fish in these parts grow fatter than a merchant's coinpurse, so have your best bait at the ready!
Kugane's no less a sight to behold, even under inhospitable skies! Keep one hand tight on your rod and the other firm on the bulwark!
Behold the glitterin' expanse of the Ruby Sea! Each fish a jewel worthy of adornin' the end of your line!
Looks like rough waters in the Ruby Sea! But if a tumbled jewel comes out prettier, then a tumbled fish... Well, I reckon we'll find out soon enough!
Here were are─the One River! You'll have your pick of the meatiest fish in Othard, assumin' you have what it takes to wrest them from the waters!
Seems the weather in the One River is less than welcomin'! But you wouldn't be here if you didn't have a steady hand and a sharp eye, so I know you'll pluck a prize from these troubled waters!
Arrive in the Mount Argai Mines
Clear the Mount Argai Mines
Arrive in the Summer Ballroom
Clear the Summer Ballroom
Arrive in the Illuminated Plaza
Defeat the spectral berserker
Hah! When I saw that airship come down, I had my suspicions, but it is you!
Hmph, when will you learn to call your lovely branch when you're in trouble? We'll discuss this later, but for now...onward!
This way, my brave sapling! This way!
Come, my lovelies! Come and join the fun!
Continue on, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! We will keep these ones busy!
A pinch of pixie magic, and─presto─a secret passage to Lakeland!
Right, you asked for it!
A good old-fashioned dwarven decking, made mightier in exile!
Come, servants of Darkness! I'll bathe in your vile blood!
Darkness must die! Die, die, DIEEEEEE!
Ahhhhhh, my blood! It burns in my veins!
I'll rend your flesh and crush your bones!
Like a gust of wind, I shall sweep away the pall of Darkness!
My swiftness knows no equal!
Fast as the Light that banishes the Dark!
I shall fight. For the world...and for you, my heart!
Embrace death!
Arise, my servants, and come to my aid!
Oh dear, tired so soon?
Very well, you may rest...but not in peace!
Hehe, such lovely blossoms of blood!
More! I need more to attend me! If you cannot stand, then crawl!
Come now, death isn't so terrible. Not when you have company, hehehe...
I would behold your beautiful blossoms! Let them bloom!
Tainted though I am, I am still a Warrior of Light!
Plunge into the depths of oblivion!
These grounds will be strewn with your flesh!
Why? Why can I not reach you? Is it because...I am tainted?
Oho, we meet again, and during such a festive occasion besides! Let us revel, my friends!
Come, come! Gather ye around, and lend an ear to my sweet melody!
You're saving some of the action for us, I trust!
Watch me, Milinda! This time I fight not to avenge, but to protect!
Compared to the Virtues, this is just a relaxing diversion!
Can't afford to botch this up─Miss Olvara would never let me live it down!
Not ashamed to admit the offer of drinks has me fired up!
Let's finish this quick and have those drinks! It's free, so Taynor can't complain!
Have a taste of dwarven tradition, you airy glowing bastards!
Arrive at the gathering ring
Clear the gathering ring
Arrive at the scalekin pen
Clear the scalekin pen
Arrive at Sunseat
Defeat Lunar Bahamut

The Amalj'aa are in trouble.
Let's split up.
Very well. I shall fly to their aid.

My poor child...
I shall free thee from thy pain.
Hmph. There's no end to them.
I will call unto my children.

The eikon waiteth in the heavens!
My child shall bear thee to him!
Preparing to fire...
Reactivating magitek field...
We must hold our ground until their defenses are broken!
Once the way is clear, strike at the enemy's heart!
